# next()

**Instance Method**

Advances to the next element and returns it, or `nil` if no next element exists.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func next() -> FlattenSequence<Base>.Iterator.Element?
```

## Discussion

Once `nil` has been returned, all subsequent calls return `nil`.
title: next()
